mcq.statement: Who served as the commander-in-chief of the Indian freedom fighting forces in the Delhi region during the War of Independence against the East India Company?
mcq.one_liner: During the War of Independence against the East India Company, **Bakht Khan** served as the commander-in-chief of the Indian freedom fighting forces in the Delhi region.
